name: css-tree
description: CSSTree is a tool set to work with CSS, including fast detailed parser (string->AST), walker (AST traversal), generator (AST->string) and lexer (validation and matching) based on knowledge of spec and browser implementations

scripts.build: npm run gen:syntax && rollup --config && terser dist/csstree.js --compress --mangle -o dist/csstree.min.js
scripts.lint: eslint data lib scripts test && node scripts/review-syntax-patch --lint && node scripts/update-docs --lint
scripts.travis: nyc npm run lint-and-test && npm run coveralls
